# Www

> This file contains information about the pages crawled from www.northstyle.com

This document lists all the pages that were crawled from the website, including their URLs and descriptions.

## Pages

- [Floral-Print French Terry Top, Vertical Center Seams, Side Slits - NorthStyle Women's Fashions](https://www.northstyle.com/itemdy00.aspx?T1=NR364+IN+S&id=152%2C4151): This page describes a floral-print French terry top for women, featuring vertical center seams and side slits. It details the garment's material, care instructions, available colors (specifically Indigo), and sizing options (Misses, Women's, and Petites), along with pricing information.
- [Free Catalog - NorthStyle Customer Service](https://www.northstyle.com/CustomerService.aspx?page=Free+Catalog): This page is NorthStyle's Customer Service portal for requesting a free catalog. It provides information on receiving new editions of their stylish women's clothing catalog and details on submitting your contact information for mail delivery.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Petite Sizes On Sale - Shop Petite Sizes On Sale Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=162,4158): This page features a sale on women's petite sizes at NorthStyle, offering discounts of up to 60% on a variety of clothing items. Shoppers can filter by color and size, with options including dresses, tops, sweaters, and outerwear, alongside a final sale section for even deeper discounts.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Foundations - Shop Foundations Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=225,4070): This page is NorthStyle's online catalog for women's foundations, featuring a variety of shapewear and undergarments like camisoles and bodysuits. It allows customers to shop for items based on color, size, and sorting preferences, offering styles designed for comfort, smoothing, and sculpting.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Sleepwear - Shop Sleepwear Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=232,4109): This webpage is for NorthStyle's women's sleepwear collection, offering stylish and versatile pajama sets in various colors and sizes, including plus sizes designed for full-figured women. Customers can filter by color, size, and sort by best sellers, price, or newest arrivals.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Necklace & Pendants - Shop Necklace & Pendants Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=226,4096): This NorthStyle webpage showcases a collection of women's necklaces and pendants. It offers a variety of stylish options with features like adjustable clasps and different materials, allowing customers to browse and shop for their preferred designs.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Tunic Shirts - Shop Tunic Shirts Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=153,4036): This webpage from NorthStyle offers a curated selection of women's tunic shirts. Shoppers can browse various styles, colors, and sizes, with featured options like shimmer tunics and button-front designs.
- [NorthStyle Women’s All Skirts & Skorts - Shop All Skirts & Skorts Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=275,6471): This page from NorthStyle showcases their collection of women's skirts and skorts, offering a variety of styles, colors, and sizes. Users can browse and shop for different skirt types like boot skirts and sweater-knit skirts, with options to filter by color and size.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Scarves, Hats & Gloves - Shop Scarves, Hats & Gloves Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=161,4073): This page showcases NorthStyle's collection of women's scarves, hats, and gloves, offering a wide variety of stylish and versatile accessories. Shoppers can browse by color and size, with featured items including plaid, knit, and sherpa gloves, as well as soft fleece-lined options.
- [NorthStyle Women’s Bags & Belts - Shop Bags & Belts Today](https://www.northstyle.com/ShopCategory.aspx?ID=227,5469): Shop women's Bags & Belts at NorthStyle. Stylish & versatile styles in a wide range of colors and sizes. Shop Bags & Belts today!
